title: Airbyte OTel: Sync Jobs are taking a longer time than usual
description: A sync job is an individual invocation of the Airbyte pipeline to synchronize data from a source to a destination data store. This monitor tracks the running time of each of these jobs using OpenTelemetry metrics. Triggers if the average duration of successful syncs in the last 5 minutes exceeds 5 minutes (300 seconds).

definition.name: Airbyte OTel: Too Many Long-Running Jobs
